column4: heya guys, I just thought i'd ask as i can't get a yes/no answer, from the same year, I have an x-fi sound card, can one get the crystaliser to work? is it even posible.
Jasa, could you point me in the direction of something like.... a graphic equaliser for ubuntu 10.10 x64 please? alot of google results are out-datad; seems Alsa is new
this will provide some idea at least.
I know you said graphical.. for Alsa I use alsamixer :) I just saw that going by though and haven't been following the convo. Maybe helps?
